attributes.review: Do not waist your time with this app. “Our president” is racist, fat, dumb, and a RAPIST he is such a disappoint and so is this app. He has time to create an app but he dosent have time to wear a mask? He can’t even keep our country stable  but he want to do this disappointing app. This is one of the worst apps I have downloaded. He did this for what? He needs to fix this pandemic then he can work on this app. I can’t believe a rapist is the president! Anyways DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP IT CAN CAUSE SERIOUS DAMAGE!
attributes.title: Another disappointment.

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see what the fuss was about and quite frankly I am appalled! This orange man came to my house with rats in and out of his pants! He barged insulting me and my family with every name in the book! And as if that was not enough; Donald trump threw my grandmother across the room resulting in serious injuries and possibly death! Not only that but he went through my pantry and when he did not find the cereal of his choice he stole my dog and said he will be eating it for SUPPER!!!
attributes.title: N0t a fan

attributes.review: this app and president is trash periodt. i would call him a cheeto but that’s rude to chester i would call him a orange but he ain’t a cutie hell nope!! he hasn’t even built the wall OR made mexico pay for it! he hasn’t even criminalized abortion how r we supposed to save our dying babies!!?? and why do i need to put in my phone number ? this fools data mining !!! that’s what he said the chinese we’re doing !!!! but we all kno he is incapable of making sense❤️ anyways, stream super bass
attributes.title: trash

attributes.review: Terrible app! Took 3 hours to download and when it finally did my phone crashed! Once I called apple support to get it all up and running again I tried redownloading and it simply wouldn’t let me.... ugh the frustration! I’ve been actively trying to find reasons why I should vote for this coward of a man again and this was the tip of the iceberg for me. Me, my wife, and my kids will no longer be supporting this cheeto of a president. Thank you!
attributes.title: Kevin White

attributes.review:
This app is as bad as his presidency. It’s clear the developers didn’t understand what they are doing. No prior experience. No understanding of technology or complex systems. So it crashed the whole system. Also lots of bad R rated behavior, like fraternizing with adult film actors, bad language, racist language and xenophobia. Terrible examples of behavior shown for our youth. I think this app might even violate App Store hate speech rules. 

Please remove from AppStore.
attributes.title: Terrible App - crashes the entire system

attributes.review: Well when I first downloaded it, I was a bit hesitant because of the various actions that have been committed by our so called president. And downloading this felt like I was supporting him and it made me sick. But my uncle told me if I loved America and didn’t want to suffer the consequences, I would have to download it. But now I realize I don’t care and Trump is an awful being to say the least :) So please, do us a favor and take this app off.
attributes.title: Please Get This App Deleted

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to learn about our president, as I can now vote. Turns out this app is a complete scam!!! I put my mobile number and I’ve been getting nonstop calls. I’m being harassed by these callers. Not to mention one of them them insulted me and said very nasty things. This app needs to be taken down!!!! Then the app keeps kicking me off. This app isn’t worth it. Please don’t fall for this scam. Definitely won’t be voting for trump 🟧🟧🟧🟧🟧🟠🟠🟠🟠🟠
attributes.title: I hate this app

attributes.review: First when I downloaded the app it kicked me out 27 times over and over it took 5 weeks to download and it took up almost all my storage I was trying to see why I could vote for trump but there was no information on him when I actually got on the app it took three hours to load and couldn’t do anything it was just one page of random stuff don’t download the app waste of time
attributes.title: Was not expecting this

attributes.review: It took forever to download and when I finally could open it, the app was very hard to navigate! My phone glitched constantly and the app crashed multiple times. These problems need to fixed so people that actually want to learn can do it effectively. My phone has been experiencing numerous problems after downloading this app, and even after deleting it. Do not recommend this!!
attributes.title: This App Broke My Phone.

attributes.review: This app was very confusing!!! It made me make an account for the app, which made me give PERSONAL information to Trump’s app, which I did not approve of. Also, the colors were tooooo blinding for my eyes like make it simple😡. There were many notifications sent to my phone that were overwhelming as well. Also, do not support Trump 2020. So yea, this app needs aloooooottttt of work, because I could not bare to use it for even 10 seconds. Thank you.
attributes.title: The app
